meta.source: Compiled from various public data sources (WHO, World Bank, Worldometer, Worlddata.info estimates)

consent.message: Please consent to see your personalized life expectancy projections. Data is based on general population statistics and health estimates from various sources and should be considered illustrative.

healthyLifestyle.message: Adopting a generally healthy lifestyle, including diet, exercise, and avoiding smoking, can add several years to your life.

preventativeCare.message: Regular preventative healthcare and screenings can improve health outcomes and lifespan.
